Name: Trino
About the game: Trino , an evolving alien, must escape the Nanites , an insidious nano-robot swarm, that have imprisoned Trino for his powers. Use Trino's powerful triangle trap to defeat the Nanites and break free from their Laser Prison! Key Features: Outwit, trap, and puzzle your enemies with quick moves and cunning triangle powers Conquer over 48 deadly stages Engage 18 clever, deceptive and unpredictable enemies Topple three Nanite swarm leaders across 3 realms Power up your triangle abilities Soothing music, sound and graphics Selected as one of the 2009 PAX 10 Listed top 20 in DreamBuildPlay 2008
Meta Title: Trino: Jan 27, 2011, Trinoteam and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Trino? Check out the release date (Jan 27, 2011), developer insights from Trinoteam, and a complete game summary.
